title: July 25th - Basic Bitch Quickie (BBQ) Weekly Roundup
itunes:title: July 25th - Basic Bitch Quickie (BBQ) Weekly Roundup
itunes:subtitle: Kardashian Family update, Johnny Depp & Amber Heard appeals,  Bachelorette New Season, Pink Sauce Debacle and San Diego Comic Con
description:
This week we've got a lot of content to parse through from our usual Kardashian family update to notable moments at San Diego Comic Con. Please see below for the topics of the week:



Kardashian Family Update

  • Kris Jenner Has Apparently Stepped In And Told Kylie Jenner To “Slow Down” Her Spending Amid The Private Jet Backlash


Johnny Depp & Amber Heard Case

  • Johnny Depp Quickly Counters Amber Heard’s Appeal Of Verdict With One Of His Own


Bachelorette + Bachelor Franchise

  • A New Campaign is calling for Fat Inclusion on the Bachelor Franchise


TikTok Debacle

  • Pink Sauce Tik Tok debacle


San Diego Comic Con Notable Moments

  • Marvel’s content announcement for the next decade
  • Warner Bros and DC muted appearance -  Not presenting Aquaman 2 or The Flash due to their controversial stars (Amber Heard & Ezra Miller)




Don't forget to follow us, review our podcast and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
